alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow wind will continue south across Johnson County through 800 PM MDT... At 714 PM MDT, automated stations reported frequent thunderstorm outflow wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph around Buffalo. The leading edge of this outflow is south of Buffalo and tracking south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Automated stations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... I-25 and I-90 in Johnson County. Kaycee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 246 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 49 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
